name: Slideshow Photo Video Maker
description:
The Slideshow Photo Video Maker app has solved the problem so that you make beautiful slideshows with your loved ones to express your feelings. You can create every kind of Photo and Video slide that covers every kind of aspect of life such as romantic, sad, happy, and many other varieties. You can share it on your Social Media Platforms. Show your expression by creating Slides with great effects that provide elegance in your content with Music, Video effects, animations along video templates so that you can create captivating Slides as well as reels and stories for Facebook and Instagram too Quickly.

 

 

Features that included in this app

 

  Photo Mix Slideshow Maker with Lots of Themes

 

● Add custom photo cover and mix photos to videos

● Video Photo book creator using slideshow photo video maker

● After effects Video editor without any watermark

● Add theme in a slideshow with music for video status using video collage maker

● Add frames to video using photo video maker to create video story

 

Animated Emoji Stickers and Text for Animations & Transitions Effects

 

● With this transition photo video maker, add animation effects to stickers, emojis, and text like PicsArt photo video editor

● Creative stickers animations to make slideshow videos more interesting with photo album maker

● Add text overlay or blend text to the slideshow for awesome adobe video editor effects

● Stunning 2D & 3D animations for creating professional photo videos.

● Now it’s easy to apply animation, VideoFX effects and create video fast and smoothly.

 

Add Music to Video with Photo Slideshow Maker

 

● Create photo to the video editor for slideshow with music

● Music for slideshow video maker provides different categories

● You can also extract high-quality audio from your videos using a photo slideshow maker and use for your slideshow video making

● Moreover, add a live photo to video voiceover of your own for a more enhanced slide show video

 

Trending Photo Slideshow Templates & Video Styles for Social Media

 

● Create slideshows for youtube shorts video, WhatsApp status video, Instagram video story, tik tok video, Snapchat story, and Facebook posts & stories using vsco photo video slideshow maker templates which are updated from time to time

● Do not waste time for color correction for slideshow videos, video slide show maker will make it easier with its impressive slideshow video fancy filters

 

Sharing Photo Slideshow Videos of Events

 

● The photo slideshow with music is a VideoShow maker application

● Funny slideshow video maker

● Birthday video maker with music

● Party image slideshow maker with audio

● Anniversary slideshow photo video maker

● Slideshow story maker for social media

● Easily share with friends, family over social media apps like Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, etc.

 

Steps to create a photo video slideshow

 

- Select Photos from gallery using slideshow maker app

- Apply Theme in photo video maker, Effects, Edit photo & video, Preview then Save

- Share it to your Social Media or with friends with one click
